data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in IJsselmeer, Netherlands from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of IJsselmeer, Netherlands

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 214,654 who are far from you in IJsselmeer, Netherlands from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary: On average, 48 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in IJsselmeer, Netherlands.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of IJsselmeer, Netherlands. Please, stir the 16,212 believers here to pray for awakening.
Spirit, teach the 16,212 believers in IJsselmeer that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, 1.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, strengthen the church in IJsselmeer, Netherlands by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in IJsselmeer, Netherlands. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the state of IJsselmeer, Netherlands has a population of 404,000.

We estimate IJsselmeer has 16,212 people who might know Jesus, 173,134 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 214,654 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 24 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of IJsselmeer, Netherlands to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
